messages.title: A fairer future for Holborn & St. Pancras
messages.content: Our country faces a fundamental choice at this election. After five wasted years during which a privileged few have prospered, but the vast majority are worse off. There are only two options: a harsh, unequal and divisive future with the Tories, or a fairer, equal and more inclusive Britain with Labour.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: To restore our NHS as a public service working cooperatively for patients, not a commercial business driven by competition.
To provide more affordable homes, a better supply of social housing and a better deal for private renters.
To work with local groups, representatives and residents to fight injustice, and defend local communities facing destruction from HS2.
To ensure our local schools continue to provide excellent education in a collaborative, inclusive way.
To be a community focused Member of Parliament for Holborn and St. Pancras.

issues.education: To ensure our local schools continue to provide excellent education in a collaborative, inclusive way.
issues.health: To restore our NHS as a public service working cooperatively for patients, not a commercial business driven by competition.

housing.content: To provide more affordable homes, a better supply of social housing and a better deal for private renters.

contactInformation.address: Freepost RZBZ-ALRL-EUJK, Holborn & St. Pancras Labour, 110 Gloucester Avenue, NW1 8HX

quotes.text: "This will be a defining election and only Labour can deliver the change we need."

images.caption: Keir Starmer: Labour candidate for Holborn & St. Pancras
